chess

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece
    ChessPiece class implements the IChessPiece Interface for game piece movement.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nate Benson, Kaye Suarez, Jake Young
